welcome_message_body: Welcome to Velbert, Germany! Get ready to explore our charming city, known for its rich history, beautiful landscapes, and vibrant culture. We hope you enjoy your time here and discover all that Velbert has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Essen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Essen Airport, mainly used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dortmund Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
